thread.title: Paper Eskimo Offers Extensive Line of Products

author: cbs8
title: Paper Eskimo Offers Extensive Line of Products
text:
Paper Eskimo
Paper Eskimo is on a mission to bring color, creativity, and excitement to parties across the globe. Paper Eskimo was founded on the notion that life should be celebrated, and they want to ensure that these celebrations are as meaningful and as beautiful as possible.
PHOENIX , Oct. 9, From the most elegant dinner party, to the most wild and wacky first birthday party, Paper Eskimo has the high quality, boutique style paper party products for any event. Paper Eskimo's line of tabletop decor includes stylish paper plates, napkins, and cups. They come in a wide variety of bright, engaging, and playful colors, including: Limoncello, Marshmallow Pink, Candy Cane Red , Powder Blue, Apple Green, Black Tie, and more. Paper Eskimo believes that a brilliant and delightful color palette can elevate any party. Paper Eskimo also has wooden cutlery, which is made out of high quality birch wood, and is suitable for all ages.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151007/275009LOGO
Paper Eskimo's product line does not end with tabletop decor. It includes party favor bags, party invitation, retro paper straws, cupcake topers, styling tags, birthday candles, and designer balloons â€“ almost anything a party planner could desire. Each item is of the highest quality and produced under precise and exacting parameters. They are also incredibly chic and stylish. Paper Eskimo believes in combining high quality products with modern, fashionable designs, to provide the best line of paper party products available on the market.
"We want to be a one-stop shopping location for party planners who want to throw creative, and stylish parties. If they take just a moment to browse our website, they will see not only how extensive our line of products is, but how cute each item is as well," said Joanna Palmer of Paper Eskimo.
"I love hearing back from families after they have thrown a party using our Paper Eskimo party supplies. When they send us an e-mail telling us what an amazing time their 5 year-old boy, or 9 year-old girl had at their birthday party, well, that is just the best part of this job. Knowing we are helping people make memories, I wouldn't trade that for anything," she later added.
About Paper Eskimo
Paper Eskimo's award-winning designs have created joy and memories to many celebrations around the world for the past 10 years. Leading the market with a unique and stylish vision, Paper Eskimo has changed the way people celebrate their events.
Contact Information

800-597-5137
